channel.title: Mike Russell on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in Mike Russell on The Majority

item.title: Illegal Referendums 'R' Us
item.description: In a major WORLD exclusive, The Majority has managed to get hold of Mike Russell's first draft of his 11-point plan for a referendum. See his orginal 12 points here, before they were massaged, soothed and tickled by an army of spin doctors... The SNP's 12-point plan for an illegal referendum 1. We intend to fool our followers by proposing that we can hold a referendum on Scottish Separation. 2. A bonus is that we can distract them from Sturgeonâ€™s problems in the Salmond inquiry.
